metadata.title: CVE-2019-7335 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Self - Stored XSS exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attackerto execute HTML or JavaScript code in the view 'log' as it insecurelyprints the 'Log Message' value on the web page without applying any properfiltration. This relates to the view=logs value.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
